lyrics.ChnStr: 如果那兩個字沒有顫抖
lyrics.EngStr: If those two words didn't tremble

lyrics.ChnStr: 我不會發現 我難受
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]不[bù]會[huì]發[fā]現[xiàn] 我[wǒ]難[nán]受[shòu]
lyrics.EngStr: I wouldn't have realized that I was hurting

lyrics.ChnStr: 怎麼說出口 也不過是分手
lyrics.Pinyin: 怎[zěn]麼[mó]說[shuō]出[chū]口[kǒu] 也[yě]不[bù]過[guò]是[shì]分[fēn]手[shǒu]
lyrics.EngStr: No matter how it's said, it's just a breakup

lyrics.ChnStr: 如果對於明天沒有要求
lyrics.EngStr: If there are no expectations for tomorrow

lyrics.ChnStr: 牽牽手就像旅遊
lyrics.EngStr: Holding hands is like a trip

lyrics.ChnStr: 成千上萬個門口
lyrics.EngStr: Thousands of doorways

lyrics.ChnStr: 總有一個人要先走
lyrics.EngStr: Someone always has to leave first

lyrics.ChnStr: 懷抱既然不能逗留
lyrics.EngStr: Since the embrace cannot stay

lyrics.ChnStr: 何不在離開的時候
lyrics.EngStr: Why not, when leaving

lyrics.ChnStr: 一邊享受 一邊淚流
lyrics.Pinyin: 一[yī]邊[biān]享[xiǎng]受[shòu] 一[yī]邊[biān]淚[lèi]流[liú]
lyrics.EngStr: Enjoy it while tears flow

lyrics.ChnStr: 十年之前 我不認識你
lyrics.Pinyin: 十[shí]年[nián]之[zhī]前[qián] 我[wǒ]不[bù]認[rèn]識[shí]你[nǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: Ten years ago, I didn't know you

lyrics.ChnStr: 你不屬於我 我們還是一樣
lyrics.Pinyin: 你[nǐ]不[bù]屬[shǔ]於[yú]我[wǒ] 我[wǒ]們[mén]還[huán]是[shì]一[yī]樣[yàng]
lyrics.EngStr: You didn't belong to me, but we were the same

lyrics.ChnStr: 陪在一個陌生人左右
lyrics.EngStr: Accompanying a stranger

lyrics.ChnStr: 走過漸漸熟悉的街頭
lyrics.EngStr: Walking through the gradually familiar streets

lyrics.ChnStr: 十年之後 我們是朋友
lyrics.Pinyin: 十[shí]年[nián]之[zhī]後[hòu] 我[wǒ]們[mén]是[shì]朋[péng]友[yǒu]
lyrics.EngStr: Ten years later, we are friends

lyrics.ChnStr: 還可以問候 只是那種溫柔
lyrics.Pinyin: 還[huán]可[kě]以[yǐ]問[wèn]候[hòu] 只[zhī]是[shì]那[nà]種[zhǒng]溫[wēn]柔[róu]
lyrics.EngStr: We can still greet each other, but that kind of gentleness

lyrics.ChnStr: 再也找不到擁抱的理由
lyrics.EngStr: I can't find a reason to embrace anymore

lyrics.ChnStr: 情人最後難免淪為朋友
lyrics.EngStr: In the end, lovers inevitably become friends

lyrics.ChnStr: 懷抱既然不能逗留
lyrics.EngStr: Since the embrace cannot stay

lyrics.ChnStr: 何不在離開的時候

lyrics.ChnStr: 直到和你做了多年朋友 才明白我的眼淚
lyrics.Pinyin: 直[zhí]到[dào]和[hé]你[nǐ]做[zuò]了[le]多[duō]年[nián]朋[péng]友[yǒu] 才[cái]明[míng]白[bái]我[wǒ]的[de]眼[yǎn]淚[lèi]
lyrics.EngStr: Only after being friends for many years did I realize that my tears

lyrics.ChnStr: 不是為你而流 也為別人而流
lyrics.Pinyin: 不[bù]是[shì]為[wéi]你[nǐ]而[ér]流[liú] 也[yě]為[wéi]別[bié]人[rén]而[ér]流[liú]
lyrics.EngStr: Were not shed for you, but also for others
